import React, { useState } from 'react' import PropTypes from 'prop-types' import Button from '../components/Button' const ProductView = props => { const product = props.product const [imgView, setImgView] = useState(product.image01) const [expand, setExpand] = useState(false) return (
setImgView(product.image01)} />
setImgView(product.image02)} />
Chi tiết sản phẩm
{/* thằng này thay cho innerHTML trong DOM để tránh xss */}

{product.title}

) } ProductView.propTypes = { product: PropTypes.object.isRequired, } export default ProductView
